numlitem.para: EE Cooling System is continuously monitored during ground operations, and
Alternate procedures are established and used.
Establish and maintain communication between Ground Crew and Flight Deck personnel.
Ensure the Equipment Cooling system is continuously monitored from the cockpit when avionics are powered during ground operations.
Ensure IRU is not operating on DC power.

placard.para: Placard Ground Crew Call System "INOP" and enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.
